description: Front porch extension; part single, part two storey rear extension; replacement of door with window to ground floor side (north-east) elevation; and 2no. single storey detached rear outbuildings (following demolition of existing outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Location Plan, 2220520-01 (Existing Plans), 2220520-02 (Existing Elevations and Section), 2220520-03 (Existing Outbuilding), 2220520-1 Rev A (Proposed Plans), 2220520-2 Rev A (Proposed Plans), 2220520-3 Rev A (Proposed Elevations and Section), 2220520-4 (Proposed Outbuilding) and Design and Access Statement prepared by Studio CAD Projects Limited (ref: SCP2220520-DAS).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The two (2) detached outbuildings hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
